title.narrative: Short-Lived Climate Pollutants - Climate and Clean Air Coalition

description.narrative: To reduce Short-Lived Climate Pollutants (SLCPs) such as black carbon, methane, and hydrofluorocarbons with 96 partners including: 43 countries, 13 intergovernmental organizations, and 40 NGOs. Reducing these pollutants can slow down global warming, prevent over two million premature deaths annually, and reduce annual crop losses of over 30 million ton after 2030. State funding is used to raise awareness of SLCP impacts/mitigation strategies, develop actions to overcome barriers and build capacity, and promote best practices.
